doc.field: - Dividend 24 francs vs 30 Consolidated net profit 115.7 mln francs vs 108.3 mln of which attributable to group 110.8 mln vs 102.5 mln Consolidated net turnover 11.16 billion francs vs 11.42 billion Parent company net profit 115.5 mln vs 95.0 mln Parent co net turnover 9.99 billion vs 9.91 billion Note - The electrical contracting company is 99.9 pct owned by the state-run Compagnie Generale d'Electricite [CGE].
